alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:53PM EST until December 21 at 3:01AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Raleigh NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Tarboro affecting Edgecombe County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tar River at Tarboro. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, The river is at bankfull. At 19.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. The Riverside Park and River Road at the US64 bridge flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 19.1 feet and remain near 19 feet through Wednesday evening. It will then fall Wednesday night and then remain below flood stage thereafter. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Tar River Tarboro 19.0 18.7 Tue 10 pm ES 18.8 18.6 16.2 11.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM Wed.Wednesday morning at 1100 AM EST.
